title: A frendly larum, or faythfull warnynge to the true harted subiectes of England Discoueryng the actes, and malicious myndes of those obstinate and rebellious papists that hope (as they terme it) to haue theyr golden day. By I. Phil.
author: Phillips, John, fl. 1570-1591.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Fleetstreete by William How: for Rycharde Iohnes,
